resources.string: Select any of the Markets below to pick a vendor.
Either no Markets were found or an network Error occurred. Please try again later.
Either no Vendor was found or an network Error occurred. Please try again later.
Shows the List of Commodities that the vendor sells with corresponding prices.
This Vendor has not yet added any commodities.
Please specify both the username and password in order for you to login.
Are you sure you want to logout?
Something went wrong. Vendor Commodity could not be saved. Are you sure you added the cost?
Please Specify the Price of this Commodity
A network error has occured. Vendor Commidty Could not be saved.
Vendor Commodity has been successfully added.
